About

I’m Alexandr Sorokoletov, Microsoft MVP.

I love developing mobile and desktop apps. I’m interested in C#/F#/.NET, Xamarin and native mobile apps.

Besides that, I enjoy snowboarding and kitesurfing. I like to travel, read books and run crazy hackathons.

Currently I reside in Washington, DC.

Twitter @alexsorokoletov

Projects

  • MTStatusBarOverlay bindings for Xamarin
  • Cocos2d-xna sample game for WindowsCamp.ru
  • Xamarin Studio Add-in to sort and remove usings in C# files when you save it
  • Google Firebase bindings for Xamarin.iOS
  • Xamarin iOS C# port of DatePickerDialog
  • Xamarin.iOS binding for Logentris lelib (LELog)
  • Xamarin.Android bindings for Material DateTime Picker

Thanks for reading!
